descriptions.name: Copper Spoon
descriptions.description: This most basic of utensils has served you well. It may be a little rusty, but you love it dearly.

descriptions.name: Silver Spoon
descriptions.description: You weren't born with this, but rather, you earned it! Or maybe you found it? Who knows for sure?

descriptions.name: Gold Spoon
descriptions.description: Not exactly practical, but you feel pretty special when wielding this utensil!

descriptions.name: Platinum Spoon
descriptions.description: Extra shimmery, extra shiny, this spoon is the most expensive thing you've ever held in your... hands? Those are hands, right?

descriptions.name: Sapphire Spoon
descriptions.description: This utensil of legend, when paired with the mythic Master Bowl, bestows upon the wielder the power to cultivate the ultimate soup!

descriptions.name: Cursed Spoon
descriptions.description: This spoon looks like someone attempted to fuse it with prongs. Why would anyone do that?!
